meanings.definition: To apply grease to (a surface or part)
meanings.sent1: He was greasing the squeaky door hinges.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was greasing the car's wheel bearings.
meanings.sent3: The chef was greasing the pan to prevent the cake from sticking.
meanings.sent4: The gardener was greasing the lawnmower, making it run smoothly.
meanings.sent5: She was greasing the bicycle chain to keep it from rusting.

meanings.definition: To bribe or influence (someone) with money or favors
meanings.sent1: The corrupt official was greasing the palms of his associates.
meanings.sent2: The lobbyist was greasing the politicians to pass the bill.
meanings.sent3: The student was greasing the teacher to get a better grade.
meanings.sent4: The businessman was greasing the deal with a generous offer.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity was greasing the paparazzi to avoid negative press.
